title: At Least 151 Killed in Halloween Crowd Surge in Seoul
description: As many as 100,000 people were celebrating in a popular nightlife district in the center of the South Korean capital.
dc:creator: Choe Sang-Hun, Chang Che and John Yoon

media:description: Medical workers early Sunday transporting a victim of the Halloween crush in the Itaewon district of Seoul.
